actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to amend the Constitution of the United States to give the several States power to protect unborn children and other persons.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that the Congress and the States shall have the power to protect life at every stage of biological development.

titles.title: A joint resolution to amend the Constitution of the United States to give the several States power to protect unborn children and other persons.
